name: Force Recon Scout Landcruiser

investigation.name: Landcruiser
investigation.description: An autonomous machine that applies the principles of naval combat to land battles.\nLandcruisers were engineered by the Armory Palace's finest engineers to serve as "armed ships that cruise on land." They are now deployed en masse at the bleeding edge of the Fatui's conquests.

description: An autonomous machine that applies the principles of naval combat to land battles, a literal "armed ship that cruises on land."\nThese walking Landcruisers with bipedal structures are often used as "scouts," for they are able to quickly traverse rough terrain and reach key positions to seize the initiative for their allies. Equipped with Force Recon armaments, this Landcruiser can not only serve as a forward scout for the main force, but can also exploit openings and actively attack the enemy where their lines are weakest, thus playing a similar role to that of traditional cavalry...
